title: Outpath Directly Download
description:
Taking Satisfactory , Forager and the gratifying gameplay loop of clicker/idle games as references, Outpath would be just that. Exploit your environment, craft, build and automate your base in this 3D first-person platformer The Coffin of Andy and Leyley
Gather. Craft. Build. Explore. Relax. No time limits, no pressure , play at your own pace and style.

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 240 / AMD Radeon HD 4670 / Intel HD  4000
